channel.title: Problem on Private Server!
channel.description: I try to make my own Runescape Private Server and I downloaded over 5 sources w/ client and all of them don't seem to load instead it says on the black screen with the red bar staying at Connecting to Update server and never loads!!!! Help with this problem!?!?!?!

item.title: Problem on Private Server!
item.dc:creator: @Tempest_Gaia Tempest Gaia
item.description:
@Tempest_Gaia wrote:

owningu:

I try to make my own Runescape Private Server and I downloaded over 5 sources w/ client and all of them don’t seem to load instead it says on the black screen with the red bar staying at Connecting to Update server and never loads!!! Help with this problem!!!

I don’t like to reccomend brand names by specifics, but I know the base and client I’m using right now works, and it’s fairly simple to use. Go here http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,465068.0.html. Then extract the client and server with winrar, and Open the source, click run in SOURCE first, then click the client, then click run x32 (mostlikely, unless you’re using a 64 bit.)

Read full topic
